title: Vaping Replaces Smoking for US Kids
itunes:title: Vaping Replaces Smoking for US Kids
description:
Dr. Joanna Cohen, Director of the Institute for Global Tobacco Control at the Johns Hopkins Bloomberg School of Public Health, talks about the health effects of vaping. Bloomberg News U.S. Economy Reporter María Paula Mijares Torres shares the details of her story about a snowballing U.S. rent crisis that spares no city or income bracket. And we Drive to the Close with Axel Merk, President & CIO at Merk Investments.
Hosts: Carol Massar and Mike Regan. Producer: Paul Brennan.  

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
